column1: I I aint got no money           Cuz I aint like those other guys you hang around       I And its kinda funny            but But they always seem to let you down        Gimme And I get discouraged            Ill cause I never see you anymore          When And I need your love babe yeah         Ure Thats all Im living for yeah           I didnt wanna pressure you baby           But all I ever wanted to do          I wanna be your lover            I wanna be the only one that makes you come running      I wanna be your lover            I wanna turn you on turn you out all night long make you shout   Oh lover Yeah              I wanna be the only one you come for        I wanna be your brother            I wanna be your mother and your sister too        There aint no other             That can do the things that Ill do to you
